csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="; ">
      <text value="DUMMY"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
  <bibliography>
    <layout>
      <group delimiter="[x]">
        <text variable="title"/>
        <number variable="volume"/>
        <number variable="issue" prefix=":"/>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </bibliography>
</style>
